Activity

We create, manage, and maintain a wide assortment of projects. Use this page to stay up to date on what we are currently doing.

In Development

International Programs at CAES

ip.ucdavis.edu is currently on a decaying server (.48) with CABA. The site also has several UX issues that will be updated.

Project Details
  • Contact: Steven Aserscion
  • Average Monthly Views: ~1400

  • Development URL: dev.ip.ucdavis.edu
  • Github Repo: github.com/ucdavis/ip

  • Design Start: 05/03/2016
  • Development Start: 06/17/2016

  • Projected Launch:Late Summer / Early Fall 2016

Edible Campus at UC Davis

After we moved ASI off (.28) only one site remained, Saladbowl Garden. After contacting the owners about retiring the site, they denied and requested a new simple site that hosts a number of the edible gardens at UC Davis.

  • Design Start: 03/01/2016
  • Development Start: 03/08/2016

  • Projected Launch: Late Summer 2016
